name: Monktastic
description: Step back in time to this nostalgic jungle themed game. Monktastic is a game for all ages. Avoid obstacles, cocoa bullets, fire and much more as you climb your way to the next level.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Processor: Intel Core Duo CPU Graphics: Mobile Intel Express Chipset Family DirectX: Version 8.0 Storage: 5.46 MB available space
